tool_description: This API, based on a powerful text analysis AI model  is able to check any grammar or spelling errors of a given text.
name: Grammar corrector API
title: Grammar corrector API

api_list.name: Check text
api_list.description: Send any text you want to check grammar or spelling.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://grammar-corrector-api.p.rapidapi.com/spelling/check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "grammar-corrector-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://grammar-corrector-api.p.rapidapi.com/spelling/check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "grammar-corrector-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
